name: webpack5-module-federation-demo
description: Complete Webpack 5 Module Federation setup with React 18, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS

scripts.install:all: npm run install:container && npm run install:remote1 && npm run install:remote2
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:container" "npm run dev:remote1" "npm run dev:remote2"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:container && npm run build:remote1 && npm run build:remote2
scripts.type-check:all: npm run type-check:container && npm run type-check:remote1 && npm run type-check:remote2
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && rm -rf container/node_modules remote1/node_modules remote2/node_modules
